business.pricing: Single-item opinions from $125; multi-piece engagements receive tailored pricing.

content.about: Birmingham Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Birmingham area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Nancy W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Michael W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: John M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

business.pricing: Express photo appraisal $175; full USPAP-compliant documentation priced individually.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Birmingham provides professional antique appraisal services in the Birmingham area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

reviews.author: Karen R.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Heritage Valuations Birmingham delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.
